titlestmt.subtitle: An inventory of the collection at Syracuse University
titlestmt.author: â€“

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: General Still Photograph Collection
did.abstract: Collection of still photographs of television and movie personalities, most from appearances on various television shows. Origin unknown.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The General Still Photograph Collection contains approximately 960 photographs of movie and television personalities, including actors, comedians, journalists, singers, and talk show hosts. Photographs are housed in five binders and are referred to by binder and photograph number -- for example, "5-24" means binder #5, photo #24.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The photographs are arranged in the binders in no particular order. To simplify locating a particular person, the inventory below is given in alphabetical order by last name.

controlaccess.head: Subject and Genre Headings
controlaccess.subject: Radio, television, film
Popular culture
Dance and theatre
Comedians -- Photographs.
Motion picture actors and actresses -- Photographs.
Television news anchors -- Photographs.
Television actors and actresses -- Photographs.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The majority of our archival and manuscript collections are housed offsite and require advanced notice for retrieval. Researchers are encouraged to contact us in advance concerning the collection material they wish to access for their research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Written permission must be obtained from SCRC and all relevant rights holders before publishing quotations, excerpts or images from any materials in this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:
